results.title: Effects of metformin on the prevention of bisphosphonate-related osteonecrosis of the jaw-like lesions in rats.
results.text_hl: The radiological analysis revealed that insulin or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration improved healing in the @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014076 @@@tooth extraction@@@ socket (p < 0.01).

citations.NLM: Nakagawa T, Tsuka S, Aonuma F, Nodai T, Munemasa T, Tamura A, Mukaibo T, Kondo Y, Masaki C, Hosokawa R. Effects of metformin on the prevention of bisphosphonate-related osteonecrosis of the jaw-like lesions in rats. J Prosthodont Res. 2021 Jun 30;65(2):219-224. PMID: 32938854

results.title: Histological evidence that metformin reverses the adverse effects of diabetes on orthodontic tooth movement in rats.
results.text_hl: Histological evidence that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reverses the adverse effects of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ on orthodontic @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014076 @@@tooth movement@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Sun J, Du J, Feng W, Lu B, Liu H, Guo J, Amizuka N, Li M. Histological evidence that metformin reverses the adverse effects of diabetes on orthodontic tooth movement in rats. J Mol Histol. 2017 Apr;48(2):73-81. PMID: 27981392
